1498796765683847168.text: I've signed onto multiple efforts – led by @RepMikeQuigley @RepJimmyGomez @RepEspaillat – to get Temporary Protected Status (TPS) for Ukrainians in the United States. Designating Ukraine for TPS is the right thing to do, and it needs to happen swiftly.

1498745105506836486.text: And not just symbolically -- we are working together and with the Administration to provide American support, including funding defensive aid and humanitarian assistance as well as ratcheting up economic pressure on Russia. Congress and the American people stand with Ukraine.
